main event: An unidentified observer reported seeing multiple blue discs in the sky near San Simeon, California, in September 1949.
interesting points: The observer noted that the discs appeared at about 2-minute intervals,The discs were estimated to be 20 inches in diameter,The observer was a veteran with military service and expressed concern about being taken seriously,The observed lights were noted to be traveling at high speeds,The sightings occurred during clear weather with no moon visible.
witness description: An observer with military background, worked with Ir. Hearst for 21 years and served in the Coast Guard.
